title: On-Site Maintenance, High speed internet, Disposal
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-Laundry Care Center', '-Individual Climate Control', '-Upgraded Swimming Pool Areas With All New Furniture and Cabanas', '-Professional Bilingual Staff', '-Air Conditioning', '-Newly Renovated Kitchens With Quartz Countertops, New Cabinets, and Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Near Public Transit', '-Updated Lavish Landscaping', '-Outdoor Sports Court', '-Covered Parking', '-New Stylish and Insulating Roofing', '-Carpet', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
